data.text:
Rebecca Villalobos: Wiki, Bio, Age, Height, Weight, Religion, Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Career, Husband, Salary, Net Worth: Rebecca is more popular as the wife of David Justice. Her birthday is celebrated every year on the 16th of August. She was born in the year 1973. Presently she is 48 years old. She is of American Nationality. She belongs to the white ethnic group.

Education of Rebecca Villalobos

Rebecca is a furniture designer, model, and entrepreneur by profession. She has attended Long Beach State University. Rebecca is a graduate of Design and Fashion merchandising.

Family of Rebecca Villalobos

In 1973 Rebecca was born to her father Dennis Villalobos and her mother Espranza Villalobos. No information is available regarding the brother or sister of Rebecca. She is married to a very famous baseball player. His name is David Justice. David Justice is a professional baseball player. Rebecca and David together have three children namely, JR Justice, Dionisio Justice, and Raquel Justice. JR Justice is 21 years old, Dionisio Justice is 19 years old and Raquel Justice is 17 years old. Rebecca and David make a happily married duo. They tied the nuptial knot in the year 2001 on the 8th of February.

Rebecca Villalobosâs Career

She is a furniture designer by profession. But she has also ventured into different fields of modeling and entrepreneurship. Rebecca has experience working with famous brands like Elle Active 3, Guess corporation, and Moda Prime. Not just this Rebecca has established a collaborated calendar line that features ethnic women. Along with it she also established a furniture line and a jewelry collection.

Net Worth of Rebecca Villalobos

Rebecca is a renowned furniture designer, an entrepreneur, and a model by profession. Above all, she is the wife of a famous baseball professional player, David Justice. The estimated net worth of the couple is estimated to be somewhere around $50,000 according to sources. Being talented herself it is expected of her to earn well.

The duo tied a nuptial knot in February 2001.

She does not have Facebook or Twitter accounts.

The couple got married in 2001.

Rebecca Villalobos is a dynamic personality and believes in sharing the insight of her life both personal and professional with the people around her. She runs an official Instagram account through which she gives insight about her lifestyle to her followers. Rebecca has around 1475 followers. Her Instagram account is named Rebecca Justice.
